A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not only was this the worst Star Wars movie ever\, it is one of the worst movies I've seen in the past 5 years...probably more.

So much garbage abound in this movie.  Luke tossing his "laser sword"...garbage.  Rose Tico...garbage.  Flying Leia...garbage.  Rey's backstory (or lack of one)...garbage.  Snoke's demise....garbage.

Skip this movie.  And the next one too.
